title: Deep Learning Practical Competency Enhancement: Scientific Thinking Improvement Course Using Concept Mapping Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement concept mapping strategies that provide customized scaffolding for students with varying levels of prior knowledge
Learners can independently create concept maps that visually represent hierarchical relationships of scientific concepts
Learners can submit project outcomes analyzing the educational effectiveness of concept maps through peer assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
